Class Item

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String Name,
    java.lang.String ReleaseDate,
    boolean isPrivate,
    java.lang.Integer Quaility,
    java.lang.Integer Platform,
    java.lang.String Description)
     throws NameTooLongException
        Creates a new Item without a picture
        Parameters:
        Name - The name of the Item
        ReleaseDate - The date when the game was released for purchase
        isPrivate - A boolean that is true if the Item is only visible to the current user
        Quaility - A numeric representation of the quality of the Item
        Platform - The intended platform of the game mapped to a number
        Description - A description of the Item
        Throws:
        NameTooLongException - This occurs if the provided Item name is more than 140 characters
